alert.note: Alert for York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mecklenburg and eastern York Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1024 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Indian Land, or near Carowinds, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Southwest Charlotte, Fort Mill, Pineville, Tega Cay, Lesslie, Steele Creek, Catawba, Carowinds and Southpark Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
